pages.title: 缘板鳖
pages.text: 缘板鳖($(o)Lissemys punctata$())是一种在南亚发现的淡水鳖。$(br2)The "flap-shelled" name stems from the presence of femoral flaps located on the plastron.$(br2)These flaps of skin cover the limbs when they retract into the shell.

pages.title: 缘板鳖
pages.text: 相对大小：★★★☆☆$(br2)始终活动$(br2)1种肤色$(br2)最喜欢的食物：minecraft:cod$(br2)种类数量：5$(br2)成长时间：6天
